game.name: Galaxy Battle
game.description: Galaxy Battle is an awesome space battle HTML5 game, where you can choose your own spaceship! Shoot on enemies, rocks and avoid damages. Do you have the skills to manage your own spaceship? Find out now in Galaxy Battle!
game.metaTitle: Galaxy Battle, Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
